meanings.sent1: Some eejits don't think before they speak.
meanings.sent2: Don't be an eejit and make the same mistake twice.
meanings.sent3: The eejit at the party kept telling the same joke over and over.
meanings.sent4: He felt like an eejit after realizing he had been using the wrong key all along.
meanings.sent5: The eejit's actions left everyone shaking their heads in disbelief.

meanings.definition: To act in a foolish or stupid manner.
meanings.sent1: Please don't eejit around and get yourself hurt.
meanings.sent2: Stop eejitting and start taking things seriously.
meanings.sent3: He eejits around when he's nervous, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: She eejitted her way through the presentation, forgetting key points.
meanings.sent5: The children eejitted happily in the playground, unaware of any worries.
